title: USB Rechargeable Arc Lighter with LED Flashlight & Compass, Windproof & Waterproof, Dual Arc Plasma Lighter (Blue)
features: 【3 IN 1 ELECTRIC LIGHTER】This electric Lighter camping with two other functions, 3 mode LED flashlight and precise compass.Compass is on the top of the cap and the flashlight is at the bottom of the electronic lighter.The flashlight and lighter share a same switch.

【WATERPROOF & WINDPROOF LIGHTER】 with metal-ring sealed lighter cover and locking clasp,water does not seep inside,no fear of rain. A cool stuff lighter that outdoor enthusiasts must have, can be used as a fire starter,camping gear,survival tool and more.You also don't need to worry about windy weather as this usb rechargeable lighter waterproof is windproof design,too.

【ARC LIGHTER】Having a windproof lighter you can rely on will make starting fires easy and will save you a lot of time. The plasma electrodes of lighter create a high temperature dual arc, that ignites a fire in an instant, and ensures still be used in strong wind or other bad weather conditions.
【PORTABLE 】This electric lighter with a lanyard,lightweight and small,you can hang it on your neck or put in your pocket,easy to carry. High-quality ABS and Zinc Alloy material,durable.

【GIFT】The waterproof lighter can meets the needs of your different occassions.You can use as a camping lighter,survival lighter,hiking lighter/flashlight and so on.It also will be good gift for Christmas,Father's Day, friends, brother,lover.
description: Product Description Lighting Design Design This outdoor arc lighter comes with a flashlight, implements a hardware optical curve halo design, and is equipped with a double-layer anti-reflection coating lens, which can completely become your portable flashlight. Compass Design The top of this multifunctional lighter is equipped with a compass. For wilderness adventure enthusiasts, having this product solves the problems of roaming in the wild, blazing a fire, and lighting at night. It can be said to be a product with high cost performance. Waterproof design design This waterproof lighter can accomplish the idea of underwater lighting, when you close its lid, it can accomplish high waterproof function. That way, even at night, you can try diving. Waterproof Flashlight Instructions Fasten the sealing buckle Press the switch to turn on the flashlight Fully compatible USB charging port Portable and tough lanyard hole Flashlight has three modes,low light,highlight,flash mode.windproof and flameless,usb rechargeable arc lighter. It is a perfect outdoor lighter,camping fire starter tool,an emergency fire starter tool and more. Windproof Lighter Instructions Open the sealing buckle downward Press the button to open the protective lid Heat resistant ceramic ignition port Press the switch to ignite Waterproof lighter,metal-ring sealed lighter cover and locking clasp,water does not sleep inside,no fear of rain,this waterproof lighter is your best choice when you go camping,travelling or hiking,arc lighter waterproof.
